description: The Brohm is a relaxed button-down designed for hot summer days and weekend road trips. Made from Dafoe™, a light, airy cotton blend, the Brohm delivers natural-fibre comfort, but includes enough polyester to provide moisture wicking performance. The Arc’teryx commitment to ergonomic freedom is built in. The fit is comfortable and clean and the fabric provides some comfort stretch. The Brohm has a subtle pocket detail, finished seams and shaped back hem that elevate its casual style.
name: Arcteryx Brohm Striped Shirt SS - Mens
